TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a game title and describe the new game in a single line

Articles.Content: Moral Kombat: Use your words and ethics wisely to defeat your political enemies
All of Duty: Infinite Warfare: Every shooter game in one, with no breaks. Literal infinte warfare.
Ratchet & Clan Ratchet gonna join to new clan

The Secret Of Money Island: A game where you run a business based on the Cayman Islands

Operation Flashpint: A game about drinking binges and drinking games.

Edited August 3, 2016 by LN400
Counter Strike: A game where your kitchen counter turns against you.

Arm 3: A game with the purpose to train and exercise limbs. Massages included.

(Arma 3)

Edited August 3, 2016 by Matuchkin
World of Tans: Get the world's best suntan.
Day : multiplayer where players experience daytime forever.

Maniac Manson: A game about a loony's journey to life in prison.

Gunhip 2000: Have fun playing the doctor who gives his patients unusual implants.

Batch Head: You must produce enough moonshine to lit a major city before the coppers come.

Assassin's Cred: You must convince the local assassins you are more than a butterfingered clown with a knife.
Verwatch: Watch as people conjugate Spanish verbs.

Metr 2033. Game about 2 kilometers and 33 meters.

Maia: Maya(3D) ?!

Edited August 5, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66

MehWarrior Online - Pilot giant robots and fight against other players for an underwhelming experience.
Itcher - Turns out mushrooms and mutagens give you a crazy rash.
Fogger: Make as many traffic accidents as you can happen AS THE FOG!

Universe Andbox2

You receive a universe, and a box. (Version 2)

Train Simulator 12

Not to be confused with Train Simulator 2012.
Overwach: You have to overly watch your washing machine.
Psychonuts: Beware Crazy Nuts!

Rad Rash: When you're so radical it burns.

(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Road_Rash_(video_game)

Erbal Space Program: HERBS! IN! SPACE! (KSP)

Spiderma: A mother (somehow) with a horrible genetic mutation giving her 8 legs and 4 eyes. (Spiderman)

Need or Speed: A game where you decide whether you need to follow the speed limit or not. (NFS)

Itman: The story of a guy named It. (Hitman)

Sms 4: A texting simulator, complete with autocorrect. (Sims 4)

Underale: A spy sneaks into a brewery. (Undertale)

The Simpsons Road Rag: Clean the roads with a drivable rag. (The Simpsons: Road Rage)

Desert Bu: A game so boring the developers fell asleep while writing the title. (Desert Bus)

Google Fed: A game where a former employee of Google hacks into the government. (Google Feud)

Un 8: The 8th game in a story about a guy called Un. (Run 8... It's a train simulator.)

Edited August 10, 2016 by UnionPacific1983WP

ITman (Hitman): A game where you must repair all the computers in the area without getting caught.

Sniper Elite V (Sniper Elite V2): The fifth installation in the Sniper Elite series. 

Arm 3 (ArmA 3): The third installation in a series about the anatomy of arms

The Long Ark (The Long Dark): A survival game set on the world's largest Ark

Quak: Duck Quack simulator.

Don't stare : Close your eyes and try to survive.

Rise of fight: Make new methods of fight

Battlefild 1: Fill trenches in WWI!

Edited August 12, 2016 by TrainEngie
Dark sous: A new hardcore secrets of Very dark sauce
Mod: There is no game. You must use your modding skills to make one. (Original: GMod)

Lazy Ones: Do what you want, if you can be bothered.

Congo Bono: Help U-2 break big in central Africa.

Street Fighter II: The Word Warrior: If you can't beat them, talk them out of it.

The Blues Bothers: You're in a rut but you're gonna get out of it.

Ole Position: Try find a new one.

Who Framed Roger Rabbi? And what name is Roger for a rabbi anyway? Can you solve the mystery?
